title: Smartphone user penetration in Argentina 2017 to 2023
summary: The chart at hand is a line chart where the x axis denotes Year and a y axis denotes Share of population. In total the number of data points it has is 7.
Overall Share of population has increased over the Year.
Share of population is slightly increasing from 2017 to 2020, and finally roughly constant from 2020 to 2023.
The steepest increase occurs in between the Year 2017 and 2018.
The highest Share of population, of value 61.0 was reached at Year 2023
Minimum Share of population about 48.0 was reached at Year 2017
